name: compression_stream
desc: A structure representing a compression stream.

items.name: init(dst_ptr: UnsafeMutablePointer<UInt8>, dst_size: Int, src_ptr: UnsafePointer<UInt8>, src_size: Int, state: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?)
items.desc: Returns a new compression stream structure.

items.name: var dst_ptr: UnsafeMutablePointer<UInt8>
items.desc: A pointer to the first byte of the destination buffer.

items.name: var dst_size: Int
items.desc: The size, in bytes, of the destination buffer.

items.name: var src_ptr: UnsafePointer<UInt8>
items.desc: A pointer to the first byte of the source buffer.

items.name: var src_size: Int
items.desc: The size, in bytes, of the source buffer.

items.name: var state: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?
items.desc: The stream state object of the compression stream.
